name: Devastated: Andrew's Dictaphone
description:
Devastated: Andrew's Dictaphone is a short Point-and-Click-Walking-Simulator. One playthrough should take you only about 15 minutes. Features:

• Completely voice acted
• Beautiful art
• Dark narrative
• Novel genre approach

SmokeSomeFrogs

This is our third project after Intra-System: Trust Issues and Flufftopia.

It was developed in cooperation with Uncreative Development.

Want to report a bug or just say hello? Contact us at protagonist@smokesomefrogs.com :)
